clues.clue: In "Grand Hotel", Greta Garbo had this 5-word desire, No. 30 on AFI's list of top 100 movie quotes

clues.answer: How to Succeed in Business Without Really Trying
clues.clue:
A "business"-like musical:
"Coffee Break" &
"The Company Way"

Take a gamble:
"Fugue For Tinhorns" &
"The Oldest Established (Permanent Floating Crap Game in New York)"

Take a swing:

"The American League"

Singing puppets!:
"Everyone's A Little Bit Racist" &
"There Is Life Outside Your Apartment"

Join the burlesque show:
"Everything's Coming Up Roses" &
"Rose's Turn"

final_jeopardy.clue: "A reviewer... wrote that my pictures didn't have any beginning or any end.  He didn't mean it as a compliment, but it was"
